code: import{combineReducers,configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import wareReducer from"./reducers/wareReducer";import authorizationReducer from"./reducers/authorizationReducer";import NotificationReducer from"./reducers/NotificationReducer";import UsersReducer from"./reducers/usersReducer";var rootReducer=combineReducers({wareReducer:wareReducer,authorizationReducer:authorizationReducer,NotificationReducer:NotificationReducer,UsersReducer:UsersReducer});export var setupStore=function setupStore(){return configureStore({reducer:rootReducer});};
